creator: mgaertner@procoma.de
text:
Using the appendend FO file produces the following:
the two tables are broken over to pages. But when I remove the attributes for 
TablleCell border-bottom and others the two tables fit on one page.
Maybe the error is in calculating the spaceleft for one page for the border-
width.

Appended FO file:
sorry, its big
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!-- edited with XML Spy v3.5 NT (http://www.xmlspy.com) by  () -->
<fo:root xmlns:fo="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format" text-align="justify" font-

creator: klease@club-internet.fr
text:
Fixed in CVS (as of April 11,2001). In the test file, both tables are now on the
same page. PS. you probably want to add "border-collapse='separate'" to the
tables to improve the border drawing on cells, at least for now.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
